Goal Privacy Friendly WiFi-Manager keeps track of the cell tower ids in your area while you are connected to a Wi-Fi. By keeping this information, the app tries to learn where your WiFi is located without using GPS.
Privacystring> This privacy friendly app preserves your privacy by tracking least necessary data. All data is kept on your phone. No data is sent to anybody. We also try to use least permissions possible.
Authors: In affiliation with More information can be found at: https://www.secuso.org Version %1$s This application belongs to the group of Privacy Friendly Apps developed by Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt. Help Welcome to Privacy Friendly WiFi-Manager Permissions Access coarse location The permission for your coarse location is needed to retrieve nearby cell information. Tutorial Tutorial Shows the tutorial. Privacy Info CyanogenMod-based Distribution Due to a bug in CM 13 you have to enable the location service (GPS). Otherwise, no WiFi networks can be found.
Tutorial: Basics Step %1$d Granting Permissions Enabling the Manager Adding a Wi-Fi Functionality SIM Card To control your WiFi based on the cell, the device has to be connected to a cell. Therefore, this functionality does not work on devices without a SIM card.
Welcome A permission is needed to retrieve nearby cell information. To use location-based features of WiFi-Manager, starting with Android 6, you have to grant access to your coarse location. If you want to use this functionality, you can request the necessary permission later. To activate the WiFi-Manager, you have to enable it by toggling the on/off button. This enables its learning feature and collects the cell ids around your Wi-Fi. It also lets WiFi-Manager take control of toggling your phone\'s Wi-Fi on/off. Now lets add a known WiFi to the list of managed WiFis. Touch the add-button on the bottom and then select a Wi-Fi in your range. While you are sitting in an area with a WiFi, you are surrounded by radio masts providing you a \'cell\' for your mobile phone. WiFi-Manager remembers which cell is near your Wi-Fi, to turn it right on when you are coming home, or turning it off, when you are leaving (e.g. work/school). By using the schedule, you can also define time slots, when your phone\'s Wi-Fi should automatically be turned off (e.g. at night). Welcome to Privacy Friendly WiFi-Manager! This app helps you automatically turning on/off your WiFi while you are not near a known WiFi.
An unmanaged Wi-Fi connection has been established Unmanaged connection New unmanaged Wi-Fi New unmanaged Wi-Fi: %1$s Manage this connection automatically Touch to manage connections WiFi %1$s now managed.
General Settings Respect signal strength Cellular signal strength will be respected for location estimation. Show notifications A notification will be shown when connected to unmanaged Wi-Fis. Automatic Wi-Fi Management: Privacy Friendly WiFi-Manager Jan Henzel, Patrick Jauernig, Dennis Werner General This app helps you automatically turning on/off your Wi-Fi while you are not near a known WiFi. How it works The main goal is to avoid location tracking via Wi-Fi, but WiFi-Manager also saves battery life by automatically disabling your phones WiFi when it is not near a already known wireless network. Benefits By switching of the Wi-Fi when it is not required, so called tracking via Wi-Fi is avoided. Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager also saves battery life by automatically disabling your phone¬¥s Wi-Fi in case it is not near an already known Wi-Fi network.
